QueryViewSpec.Name: Child Project Disbursement Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: This is used to get the sponsored / unsponsored registered children counts
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
with RegisteredChildren (FIELDOFFICEID, PROJECTLOOKUPID, SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS) as ( select FIELDOFFICEID, dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_GETLOOKUPID (FIELDOFFICEID) as PROJECTLOOKUPID, so.ID SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, --case -- when dbo.UFN_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY_ACTIVESPONSORSHIPS(so.ID) > 0 then 'Sponsored' -- when AVAILABILITYCODE = 1 then 'Unsponsored - Reserved' -- else 'Unsponsored' --end as SPONSORSHIPSTATUS, --coalesce (dbo.USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCURRENTSTATUSFROMSPONSORSHIPEXTENSION (so.ID),'') as CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS1, coalesce(ct.[DESCRIPTION],'') as CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS
from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation on slocation.ID = so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so.ID = so_child.ID left join dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION ch_ext on so.ID = ch_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID left join dbo.usr_sponsorshipextension se on se.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and se.ISCURRENT = 1 left join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE ct on ct.ID = se.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID
where (ch_ext.Funded=1 /* or (slocation.STATUSCODE = 1 -- Inactive and slocation.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = '3EC2BD25-FEC7-41B9-8C4F-DDA63C063DEC') -- phasing out */ )
and so.ELIGIBILITYCODE in (0,1) -- @eligibilityCodePending, @eligibilityCodeEligible) ) select FIELDOFFICEID, PROJECTLOOKUPID, convert (varchar(10), GETDATE(), 1) as DATADATE, sum(case when CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS='Sponsored' then 1 else 0 end) as SPONSOREDCOUNT, sum(case when CURRENTSPONSORSHIPSTATUS='Sponsored' then 0 else 1 end) as UNSPONSOREDCOUNT, count(*) as TOTALCHILDCOUNT from RegisteredChildren group by FIELDOFFICEID, PROJECTLOOKUPID
